summary: This mod adds two playable races to the game. Deadlands Dremora and Coldharbour Dremora.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]=============================
Morrowind1979's Playable Dremoras
=============================[/center][/size]

Dremora, or, to themselves, the Kyn, are a form of humanoid Daedra. They serve Mehrunes Dagon,  although they have been known to serve other Daedric Princes. They are the most honorable of Mehrunes Dagon's servants. They have a very militaristic culture, with many ranks and subdivisions within the culture of each clan.

This mod adds two playable races to the game. Deadlands Dremora and Coldharbour Dremora. Each race has

4 horn styles (hair slider) and a variety of face tattoos (complexion slider).

[size=5]---------------------
Requirements
---------------------[/size]

Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Race Compatibility: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/

[size=5]---------
Notes
---------[/size]

Unrar and copy to the data directory. If using Nexus Mod Manager when asked to replace files choose yes to all.

Make sure Race Compatibility.esm comes before MWPlayableDremoras.esp in your load order.

[size=5]---------------------------------------
Deadlands Dremora Stats
---------------------------------------[/size]

One-handed    10
Two-handed    10
Block        5
Heavy Armor    5
Smithing    5
Enchanting    5


Total        40

[size=5]----------------------
Racial/Powers
----------------------[/size]

Dagon's Rage: Once a day take half damage and do double damage for 60 seconds
Power of Dagon: Fortify melee damage 10%

[size=5]-----------------------------------------
Coldharbour Dremora Stats
-----------------------------------------[/size]

Destruction    10
Conjuration    10
Restoration    5
Illusion    5
Heavy Armor    5
Lockpicking    5


Total        40

[size=5]----------------------
Racial/Powers
----------------------[/size]

Voice of Molag Bal: Once a day command a summoned creature up to level 50.
Boon of Molag Bal:  Resist Magic 25%
author: Morrowind1979
